mapper.select: SELECT P.BILLING_KEY AS billingKey, P.PAYMENT_METHOD_CD AS paymentMethodCd, RF.RENT_HIST_SEQ AS rentHistSeq, RH.RENT_DTTM AS rentDttm, PAYMENT_ATT_CNT AS paymentAttCnt, OVER_FEE AS overFee, IFNULL((SELECT MB_ID FROM TB_SVC_MB WHERE USR_SEQ = U.USR_SEQ),'GUEST') AS mbId, U.USR_SEQ AS usrSeq, RF.OVER_MI AS overMi, IFNULL((SELECT dg_decrypt('TB_SVC_MB', 'MB_EMAIL_NAME', MB_EMAIL_NAME) FROM TB_SVC_MB WHERE USR_SEQ = U.USR_SEQ ) ,'GUEST@seoulbike.co.kr') AS mbEmailName, cast(dg_decrypt('TB_SVC_USR', 'USR_MPN_NO', U.USR_MPN_NO) as CHAR) AS usrMpnNo, V.PAYMENT_CLS_CD FROM TB_SVC_RENT_OVER_FEE RF, TB_SVC_RENT_HIST RH, TB_SVC_USR U LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVC_PAYMENT_METHOD P ON U.USR_SEQ = P.USR_SEQ, TB_SVC_VOUCHER V WHERE 1=1 AND RH.USR_SEQ = U.USR_SEQ AND RF.RENT_HIST_SEQ = RH.RENT_HIST_SEQ AND OVER_FEE_PAYMENT_YN = 'N' AND PAYMENT_ATT_CNT < ( SELECT ADD_VAL1 FROM spb.TB_SYS_COM_CD WHERE COM_CD='MSI_005') AND RH.VOUCHER_SEQ = V.VOUCHER_SEQ AND P.BILLING_KEY IS NOT NULL
